cards.title: Dauntless
powers: Deal X energy damage to a target, where X = 1 + the number of Charge cards attached to Dauntless / 2 (round down)
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may draw a card now
Reduce all energy damage dealt to hero targets by 1 until your next turn
Select an equipment card. Until your next turn it is indestructible

cards.title: Arcshield
body: This card is indestructible
powers: Until the end of your next turn reduce damage dealt to Dauntless by X, where X = 1 + the number of Charge cards attached to this card / 2 (round down)
cards.flavorText: He was holding his shield arm up{BR}and it had formed into{BR}a bubble-shaped forcefield

cards.title: Arcstep
body: This card is indestructible
powers: Draw X cards, where X = 1 + the number of Charge cards attached to this card / 2 (round down){BR}You may play a card

cards.title: Crystallization
body: Play this card next to {DauntlessCharacter} or a Relic in this play area
When this card enters play {DauntlessCharacter} may deal 1 energy damage to a target
This card is indestructible
cards.flavorText: His power let him imbue his gear{BR}with a little bit of power every day

cards.title: Plasma Core
body: Play this card next to {DauntlessCharacter} or a Relic in this play area without a Plasma Core
[b]On {DauntlessCharacter}:[/b] his power does irreducible damage
[b]On Arcshield:[/b] whenever {DauntlessCharacter} is dealt damage and it is reduced by Arcshield's power {DauntlessCharacter} deals the source 1 energy damage
[b]On Arcstep:[/b] after using Arcstep's power regain 1 HP

cards.title: Matter to Energy
body: Play this card next to {DauntlessCharacter} or a Relic in this play area without a Matter to Energy

[b]On {DauntlessCharacter}:[/b] choose the damage type for his power{BR}[b]On Arcshield:[/b] after using Arcshield's power pick a damage type; reduce all damage of that type by 1 until the end of your next turn{BR}[b]On Arcstep:[/b] after using Arcstep's power {DauntlessCharacter} deals up to 3 targets 1 energy damage

cards.title: To Me!
body: Search your deck for a Relic and put it into play. Shuffle your deck.
Draw a card. You may play a card

cards.title: Outfitting
body: Select a hero. That hero reveals cards from the top of their deck until they reveal an Equipment card. They may put that card into play or into their hand. Shuffle the other revealed cards back into their deck

cards.title: Resolve
body: Reveal cards from the top of your trash or the top of your deck until you reveal a Charge card. You may put it into play or into your hand. Shuffle the other cards back where they came from

cards.title: Your Opponent Is Me
body: {DauntlessCharacter} deals 2 energy damage to up to 2 targets.
Until the start of your next turn whenever those targets would deal damage redirect that damage to {DauntlessCharacter}

cards.title: Heroic Image
body: {DauntlessCharacter} regains 2 HP
Select a hero target. Until the start of your next turn whenever that target would be dealt damage redirect that damage to {DauntlessCharacter}

cards.title: Glorious Stand
body: Whenever a hero target would be dealt damage, redirect the damage to {DauntlessCharacter}
At the start of your turn destroy this card

cards.title: Crackling Corona
body: {DauntlessCharacter} deals 1 energy damage to all villain targets

cards.title: Carry the Charge
body: Whenever {DauntlessCharacter} is dealt damage you may draw a card. If it was energy or lightning damage you may play a card as well
